H3.text: Author Thomas Hardy trained for which profession. ARCHITECT

A4.text: Thomas Hardy was an apprentice to John Hicks, an architect, which indicates he trained as an architect.

A5.text: There is no mention of Thomas Hardy receiving training or working as an engineer in the provided text.

A6.text: The text does not indicate that Thomas Hardy was trained or worked as a lawyer.

A7.text: Thomas Hardy's friends during his apprenticeship included ministers, but there is no evidence he himself was trained as a minister.
